title: Ministry of Infrastructure and Sustainable Energy
text: The Ministry of Infrastructure and Sustainable Energy (MISE) is a <a href="Cabinet%20of%20Kiribati">government ministry</a> of <a href="Kiribati">Kiribati</a>, as <a href="ministry%20of%20infrastructure">ministry of infrastructure</a> and as <a href="ministry%20of%20energy">ministry of energy</a>, headquartered in <a href="South%20Tarawa">South Tarawa</a>.
